### About

#### Data

<big>

- Country data is from the Johns Hopkins Center for Systems Science and Engineering
GitHub repository:  
https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19.
- Data for US states is from the COVID Tracking Project:  
https://covidtracking.com/.
- Data for US counties is from The New York Times: 
https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/us/coronavirus-us-cases.html.

#### Inspiration

- The primary chart style was inspired by this 
[Financial Times article](https://www.ft.com/content/a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441) and the work of 
[John Burn-Murdoch](https://twitter.com/jburnmurdoch).  
- The *New vs All* charts were inspired by the 
[Covid Trends](https://aatishb.com/covidtrends/) chart and explainer by
[Aatish Bhatia](https://aatishb.com/).

#### Credit

Data analysis and visualization by Kent Johnson. 
[GitHub source](https://github.com/kent37/coronavirus)

</big>
